header.topics: Social networking, computer maintenance, software and hardware, retro technology, working out, food & recipes, YouTube, mixed martial arts, TVs, mine & ANON's history, clothes, South Korea, hiking, healthy eating, journeys & distances, school, neighbours, local news, golf, horse riding, animals
header.activity: Testing my new laptop with my brother and friend
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling, telling jokes
